name: Core Qualities
description: Core combat qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: Instinct
qualities.description: Your Digimon possesses a driving force behind its movements, derived from the energy of its own being. The Digimon gains a +1 bonus to its Dodge, Health and Movement. This doubles consecutively for each Rank in Instinct, shown on the Table. The number of ranks a Digimon can take is equal to its Stage, to a maximum of 5, indicated by the table.

qualities.name: Weapon
qualities.description: Your Digimon has a Weapon, or some type of fighting style it prefers. Attacks which use said Weapon or fighting style may gain a [WEAPON] Tag. A Digimon may only have a number of [WEAPON] Tagged Attacks equal to the ranks it has in this Quality. Whenever a Digimon uses a [WEAPON] Tagged Attack, it gains a bonus to Accuracy and Damage equal to the ranks in this Quality. The number of ranks a Digimon can take is equal to its Stage, to a maximum of 5, indicated by the table.
